thread.title: Check out the tracklist for Adele's '25'
thread.title_full: Check out the tracklist for Adele's '25' | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Dave Herrera
title: Check out the tracklist for Adele's '25'
text:
Ever since a 30 second teaser clip featuring a snippet from a new song from Adele was snuck into a commercial break during the X-Factor this past weekend, the buzz has been steadily building about the prospects of a new record from the pop star. 
Expect that buzz to get progressively louder before reaching a fever pitch when the album finally drops a little less than a month from now. Yesterday Adele followed up the surprise airing with a bit about the album on her Facebook page, today she offered up the tracklist, artwork and release date. Tomorrow the Xavier Dolan-directed video for “Hello” is set to premiere. 
You can go ahead and call it now, even having heard little more than a few notes of “25.” The is the album of the year, and it’s going to absolutely dominate in every way when it drops on Friday, Nov. 25. No need to consult an oddsmaker. 
Like “21,” Adele’s previous paradigm-shifting, diamond-certified platter, you can count on this new record to consume conversations, spawn several singles that garner massive airplay across multiple formats and grab a slew of album of the year nods. 
While it will be more than a year before she’s rewarded critically with another armload of statues, as it’s now past the cutoff date for Grammy consideration in 2015, Adele’s likely to enjoy plenty of dividends otherwise. 
The timing of “25” couldn’t be better for sales (not that Adele needs any help there; her last release was so well received that people actually began buying music again). Due out just a week before Black Friday, you can bet that plenty of people on the planet will be pulling “25” out of their stockings a month or so afterward. 
In the meantime, here’s the full tracklist (including a trio of songs that will be included exclusively on a release only being made available at Target). 
01. Hello 
02. Send My Love (To Your New Lover) 
03. I Miss You 
04. When We Were Young 
05. Remedy 
06. Water Under The Bridge 
07. River Lea 
08. Love In The Dark 
09. Million Years Ago 
10. All I Ask 
11. Sweetest Devotion 
12. Can’t Let Go* 
13. Lay Me Down* 
14. Why Do You Love Me* 

*Target exclusive bonus track. 
Hip-hop act The Internet... Catch Rick Springfield...
